newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Ross Systems raised to buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Ross Systems raised to buy.

text.p: -- Hambrecht & Quist said its analyst Kenneth Durke has raised his rating on Ross Systems Inc to buy from hold due to positive trends at the company and its discounted value compared to other software application vendors.
-- In a written statement, Durke said the company continues to make progress in its markets, especially for software targeted to manufacturing applications.
-- Durke expects earnings to rise from $0.40 a share in fiscal 1997 to $0.55 a share in fiscal 1998.
